meanings.definition: The act of disappearing or vanishing.
meanings.sent1: The sudden disappearance of the magician amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The disappearance of the sun behind the clouds signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The disappearance of my keys always leads to a treasure hunt in my house.
meanings.sent4: The disappearance of the old factory marked the end of an era in the town.
meanings.sent5: The disappearance of the stars in the morning sky left a sense of emptiness.

meanings.definition: The state of being lost or missing.
meanings.sent1: The disappearance of the hiker in the dense forest caused concern among the search party.
meanings.sent2: The disappearance of the remote control always leads to a frantic search in the living room.
meanings.sent3: The disappearance of my favorite pen is a mystery I can't solve.
meanings.sent4: The disappearance of the last piece of cake left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The disappearance of the cat in the house turned into a game of hide-and-seek.

meanings.definition: The act of ceasing to exist or be seen.
meanings.sent1: The sudden disappearance of the music from the party made everyone stop and look around.
meanings.sent2: The disappearance of the ancient ruins over time saddened the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The disappearance of the ice cream in the freezer was blamed on the mysterious 'ice cream thief'.
meanings.sent4: The disappearance of the old traditions in the modern world is a topic of debate.
meanings.sent5: The disappearance of the road in the thick fog created a sense of isolation.
